areas.name: SaaS Platform Development
areas.description: Core product development with dashboard, onboarding flows, agent chat, and analytics.

areas.name: Tools & Agent Infrastructure
areas.description: Building and debugging API tools, connectors, and an AI agent orchestration system.

areas.name: DevOps & Infrastructure

areas.name: Payments & Billing

interaction_style.narrative: You are a high-velocity, production-oriented builder who treats Claude Code as a full-stack development partner across an impressive 974 hours of usage. Your dominant pattern is driving end-to-end feature lifecycles in single sessions. You frequently chain multiple tasks together in rapid succession. Your TypeScript-heavy workflow (4,169 file touches) shows you're building something substantial and shipping constantly — 256 commits across ~2 months with 3,084 messages exchanged from Dec 31 to Feb 24.
interaction_style.key_pattern: A fast-shipping builder who chains entire feature lifecycles into single sessions.

what_works.intro: Across 180 sessions and 256 commits, an impressive full-stack development workflow.

impressive_workflows.title: End-to-End Feature Lifecycle Mastery
impressive_workflows.description: Consistently driving features from planning through implementation, code review, PR creation, and deployment all within single sessions.

impressive_workflows.title: Parallel Sub-Agent Architecture Audits
impressive_workflows.description: Spawning 8 parallel sub-agents for codebase architecture audits, producing scored assessments that feed directly into actionable fix plans.

impressive_workflows.title: Rapid Bug-Fix-to-PR Pipeline
impressive_workflows.description: An efficient bug fix workflow completing the entire cycle — implement, review, fix findings, push PR — in under 10 minutes.
